name: places/ChIJb41rTwBZwokRDKUqO1DyoWI
adrFormatAddress: 501 5th Ave #703, New York, NY 10017, USA

originalText.text: Dr. Pang is an amazing individual who loves what he does. Probably one of the better experiences as an adult visiting the dentist. Very polite, professional and thoughtful with his approach. It’s a small office but it felt personal as he was very attentive to my needs. His staff was friendly, welcoming and accommodating as a new patient. They were kind enough to explain everything throughout my visit as I asked questions. I would recommend him for your dental needs.

text.text: Dr. Pang is an amazing individual who loves what he does. Probably one of the better experiences as an adult visiting the dentist. Very polite, professional and thoughtful with his approach. It’s a small office but it felt personal as he was very attentive to my needs. I would recommend him for your dental needs.

originalText.text:
I've been searching for a good dental practice for years and finally found Your Dental Bryant Park. I have anxiety when going to the dentist (because past experiences) but Dr. Pang and his team made me feel welcomed. I could tell their top priority was my care and comfort. Hands down the best cleaning I've ever gotten! I have sensitive gums and I really just about dozed off during the cleaning.

Truthfully, I do need a lot of work done and I knew this before coming in, but was trying to find a practice that wouldn't be referring me out to expensive specialists every time. BUT Dr. Pang does just about everything from cleanings to extractions to implants! They also do Invisalign! He explained what would need to be done and answered all my questions... no matter how insignificant I thought the questions was. I think I found my forever dentist!

Also, the room has a beautiful view of 5th Ave and LOVE how close they are to where I work. My appointment also gave me an excuse to take a breather at Bryant Park before heading back into work. The sweetest dental assistant Kira, gave me some fun recommendation for places to eat in the area.

originalText.text: I will always be forever grateful for Dr. Pang and his team. We flew to NYC for vacation and my 9 year old daughter had a dental emergency. His office made accommodations to open early to get her in because of the amount of pain she was in. He treated her, ordered the antibiotics she needed and his team checked in later to make sure she was ok. Best experience I've ever had. High recommend them!

text.text: I will always be forever grateful for Dr. Pang and his team. We flew to NYC for vacation and my 9 year old daughter had a dental emergency. His office made accommodations to open early to get her in because of the amount of pain she was in. He treated her, ordered the antibiotics she needed and his team checked in later to make sure she was ok. Best experience I've ever had. High recommend them!

originalText.text:
Jason Pang, is an outstanding dentist. He’s extremely kind and patient. He’s a very good listener too! You can tell him all your worries and concerns and he will answer each and everyone. I’ve had a lot of work done and I couldn’t be happier with the results! Plus, his staff is genuinely nice.

When you walk into his office, you immediately feel the positive energy that’s in the air. They are sincere and want to help. Bottom line, you will not go wrong with Jason Pang. He is the best dentist in New York!

When you walk into his office, you immediately feel the positive energy that’s in the air. They are sincere and want to help. Bottom line, you will not go wrong with Jason Pang. He is the best dentist in New York!

originalText.text: Dr. Pang was extremely caring, patient, and attentive! I came in for a cleaning and checkup, and was thoroughly satisfied with my experience. He was very thorough. The office staff here are incredibly kind and helpful as well. These group of professionals are really great people and excellent at what they do. I highly recommend.
